meanings.sent1: After too many drinks, he was blotto and could barely stand.
meanings.sent2: She stumbled out of the party, blotto and giggling uncontrollably.
meanings.sent3: The blotto man tried to dance on the table but ended up falling flat on his face.
meanings.sent4: The blotto state of the party reminded her of a chaotic circus.
meanings.sent5: The blotto feeling lingered in his head the next morning, a reminder of his wild night.

meanings.sent1: The blotto bottle slipped from his hands and shattered on the floor.
meanings.sent2: The blotto car sat abandoned by the side of the road, beyond repair.
meanings.sent3: She found her blotto phone in the fridge, a result of her tipsy forgetfulness.
meanings.sent4: The blotto ruins of the ancient castle stood as a testament to its former glory.
meanings.sent5: The blotto cake lay in crumbs on the plate, devoured by hungry guests.
